entry.title: Limited Edition Crescent Sit Set
entry.summary:
Vendor: Halfmoon
Type: Unclassified
Price: 220.00

Our Zabuton and Crescent Meditation Cushion are a beautiful and comfortable combination for meditation and casual sitting at home.

Our Zabuton is the perfect size and shape to support your seat, legs, and feet. This soft platform lifts you off the floor and provides extra cushioning for the feet and ankles to maintain a comfortable seated position for longer periods of time. When used with our buckwheat-filled, malleable, Crescent Meditation Cushion, you have set yourself up perfectly for long periods of comfortable sitting and meditation.

This Crescent Meditation Cushion is part of our Halfmoon Limited Edition Collection, a limited-time offering showcasing Halfmoon creative vision for that season. Carefully selecting patterns and prints allows us to bring to life modern, quality, and current fabrics that will enhance and elevate your studio, home, or zen space. Reinvigorate life into your meditation and yoga practice with these curated selections.


FEATURES

  • Crescent Meditation Cushion:

    • Adjustable support for optimal sitting posture

    • Malleable buckwheat fill shapes to any seat

    • Handy carry handle

    • Crescent shape allows room for you to tuck your feet and ankles in towards the body

  • Zabuton:

    • Removable cover

    • Cushions ankles and seat


SPECS

  • Crescent Meditation Cushion

    • 20" x 11" x 5" (51 cm x 28 cm x 13 cm)

    • 5.8 lbs (2.6 kg)

    • Cushions are filled by volume. Due to the natural differences in buckwheat, weight may vary by 5%

    • Cover: 100% linen

    • Casing 100% cotton 

    • Filing: 100% natural Canadian buckwheat hulls

  • Zabuton

    • 24" x 30" x 4" (61 cm x 76 cm x 10 cm)

    • 0 6.8 lbs (3.0 kg)

    • Cover: 100% linen

    • Casing 100% cotton 

    • Filling: 97% cotton 3% polyester 

  • Handcrafted just outside Vancouver, BC, Canada


PRODUCT CARE

  • Crescent Meditation Cushion

    • Empty the buckwheat filling into a large container

    • Wash the cover in a cold water washer setting, and hang to dry

    • Use a funnel to insert the buckwheat hulls back into the cover (you can even make a funnel but rolling up a piece of paper and inserting it into the opening)

  • Zabuton

    • Remove cover

    • Wash the cover in a cold water washer setting, and hang to dry 

  • Do not bleach

entry.title: Limited Edition Mod Sit Set
entry.summary:
Vendor: Halfmoon
Type: Unclassified
Price: 220.00

Our Zabuton and Mod Meditation Cushion are a luxurious combination for your meditation practice and casual sitting at home. Our Zabuton is the perfect size and shape to support your seat, legs, and feet. This soft platform lifts you off the floor and provides extra cushioning for the feet and ankles to maintain a comfortable seated position for longer periods of time. When used with our buckwheat-filled, malleable, Mod Meditation Cushion, you have set yourself up perfectly for long periods of comfortable sitting and meditation.

This set is part of our Halfmoon Limited Edition Collection is a limited time offering showcasing Halfmoon's creative vision for that season. Carefully selecting patterns and prints allows us to bring to life modern, quality and current fabrics that will enhance and elevate your studio, home or zen space. Reinvigorate life into your meditation and yoga practice with these curated selections.


FEATURES

  • Mod Meditation Cushion:

    • Adjustable support for optimal sitting posture

    • Malleable buckwheat fill shapes to any bottom

    • Handy carry handle

    • Modern shape that fits with your decor

  • Zabuton:

    • Removable cover

    • Cushions ankles and seat


SPECS

  • Meditation Cushion:

    • 13" x 5.5" (33 cm x 14 cm)

    • 6.0 lbs (2.7 kg)

    • Cushions are filled by volume - due to the natural differences in buckwheat, weight may vary by + or 5%

    • Cover: 100% cotton

    • Filling: 100% natural Canadian buckwheat hulls

  • Zabuton:

    • 24" x 30" x 4" (61 cm x 76 cm x 10 cm)

    • 6.8 lbs (3.0 kg)

    • Cover: 100% linen

    • Filling: 97% Cotton 3% Polyester

  • Handcrafted just outside Vancouver, BC, Canada


PRODUCT CARE

  • Mod Meditation Cushion

    • Empty the buckwheat filling into a large container

    • Wash the cover in a cold water washer setting, and hang to dry

    • Use a funnel to insert the buckwheat hulls back into the cover (you can even make a funnel but rolling up a piece of paper and inserting it into the opening)

  • Zabuton

    • Remove cover

    • Wash the cover in a cold water washer setting, and hang to dry 

  • Do not bleach


NOTES

  • There is no inner casing for the whole buckwheat hulls. Unzip your cushion carefully to empty the hulls for cover cleaning.

entry.title: Limited Edition Round Sit Set
entry.summary:
Vendor: Halfmoon
Type: Unclassified
Price: 220.00

Our Zabuton and Round Meditation Cushion are a traditional and timeless combination for meditation and casual sitting at home.

Our Zabuton is the perfect size and shape to support your seat, legs and feet. This soft platform lifts you off the floor and provides the extra cushioning for the feet and ankles to maintain a comfortable seated position for longer periods of time. When used with our buckwheat filled, malleable, Round Meditation Cushion, you have set yourself up perfectly for long periods of comfortable sitting and meditation.

This Zabuton is part of our Halfmoon Premium Linen Collection and is a premium, timeless and earth-friendly option within our textile lineup. With an elevated, yet artisanal aesthetic, you can invest in this luxurious fabric option in good-conscience. The low levels of water used to grow the flax plants in creating these fibres, make it much more earth-friendly than alternative fibres in the market. Bonus: Our linens not only have a soft handfeel and cooling properties, but also are biodegradable!


FEATURES

Round Meditation Cushion:

  • Adjustable support for optimal sitting posture

  • Malleable buckwheat fill shapes to any bottom

  • Handy carry handle

  • Timeless and traditional round shape

Zabuton:

  • Removable cover

  • Cushions ankles and seat


SPECS

Meditation Cushion:

  • 18" x 18" x 5" (46 cm x 46cm x13cm) in diameter

  • 6.0 lbs (2.7 kg)

  • Cover: 100% cotton

  • Inside: Filled with natural buckwheat hulls

  • Cushions are filled by volume. Due to the natural differences in buckwheat, weight may vary by up to 5%

Zabuton:

  • 24" x 30" x 4" (61 cm x 76 cm x 10 cm)

  • 6.8 lbs (3.0 kg)

  • Cover: 100% linen 

  • Inside: cotton batting in unbleached cotton casing

  • Handmade just outside of Vancouver, BC, Canada

Handcrafted just outside Vancouver, BC, Canada

Our Zabuton and Round Meditation Cushion are a traditional and timeless combination for meditation and casual sitting at home. 

Our Zabuton is the perfect size and shape to support your seat, legs, and feet. This soft platform lifts you off the floor and provides the extra cushioning for the feet and ankles to maintain a comfortable seated position for longer periods of time. When used with our buckwheat filled, malleable, Round Meditation Cushion, you have set yourself up perfectly for long periods of comfortable sitting and meditation. 

This set is part of our Halfmoon Premium Linen Collection and is a premium, timeless, and earth-friendly option within our textile lineup. With an elevated, yet artisanal aesthetic, you can invest in this luxurious fabric option in good-conscience. The low levels of water used to grow the flax plants in creating these fibers, make it much more earth-friendly than alternative fibers in the market. Bonus: Our linens not only have a soft hand feel and cooling properties but also are biodegradable!


FEATURES

Round Meditation Cushion:

  • Adjustable support for optimal sitting posture

  • Malleable buckwheat fill shapes to any bottom

  • Handy carry handle

  • Timeless and traditional round shape

Zabuton:

  • Removable cover

  • Cushions ankles and seat


SPECS

Meditation Cushion:

  • 18" x 18" x 5" (46 cm x 46cm x13cm) in diameter

  • 6.0 lbs (2.7 kg)

  • Inside: Filled with natural buckwheat hulls

  • Cushions are filled by volume. Due to the natural differences in buckwheat, weight may vary by up to 5%

  • 24" x 30" x 4" (61 cm x 76 cm x 10 cm)

Handcrafted just outside Vancouver, BC, Canada


PRODUCT CARE

  • Meditation Cushion: Unzip case and pour hulls into a bag. Cold wash cover, hang to dry, refill.

  • Zabuton: Simply remove cover. Cold wash, hang to dry.

entry.title: Essential Cotton Mod Sit Set
entry.summary:
Vendor: Halfmoon
Type: Unclassified
Price: 184.00

Our Zabuton and Mod Meditation Cushion are a luxurious combination for your meditation practice and casual sitting at home. Our Zabuton is the perfect size and shape to support your seat, legs, and feet. This soft platform lifts you off the floor and provides extra cushioning for the feet and ankles to maintain a comfortable seated position for longer periods of time. When used with our buckwheat-filled, malleable, Mod Meditation Cushion, you have set yourself up perfectly for long periods of comfortable sitting and meditation.

This set is part of our Halfmoon Essential Cotton Collection and is made of 100% all-natural cotton fibers that resist shrinking, stretching, and are highly durable. This 100% natural plant-derived fiber is biodegradable, easy-to-clean, and breathable making it a perfect studio-friendly core item. The Essential Cotton Collection is all custom-dyed for Halfmoon specifically, making the colours exclusive to the Halfmoon lineup and core colour stories.
